item.title: Version 0.2.0
item.description:
DdukMemo v0.2.0

Rich Document Editor

  • New block-based rich text editor for action panels
  • Checkboxes with inline toggle — type [] to create
  • Link previews — paste a URL to auto-generate a rich card
  • Timer and alarm blocks with calendar sync
  • Section headers for organizing content
  • Arrow key navigation between blocks
  • Content folding — collapse long text blocks

Index Window Redesign

  • Flattened UI with unified glass sidebar
  • Tabbed content area (Activity / Todo)
  • Improved search with real-time filtering
  • Project accent colors throughout
  • Design system token migration

Action Panel Improvements

  • Workspace strip — bookshelf-style attachment display
  • Content folding for text, checkbox, and workspace items
  • Title auto-syncs from first block content
  • Improved drag and drop between panels

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed text truncation when typing rapidly in action panels
  • Fixed checkbox alignment and focus handling
  • Fixed stale document state after quick edits
  • Improved Swift 6 concurrency safety

item.title: Version 0.1.1
item.description:
DdukMemo v0.1.1

Important: Manual Update Required

This version includes an app rename. Please update manually:

  1. Quit "Project PA" completely
  2. Open the downloaded DMG
  3. Drag "DdukMemo" to Applications (replace if asked)
  4. Delete old "Project PA.app" from Applications

Your data is safe - it's stored in ~/Library, not inside the app.

What's New

App Rebranding

  • App renamed from "Project PA" to "DdukMemo"

Dock Icon Behavior

  • Dock click now prioritizes bringing action panels to front
  • Opens Index window only when no panels are open
  • Added "Open Index Window" to dock right-click menu

Action Panel Header Redesign

  • New button order: Pin, Attachment, New Panel
  • "Complete" button moved to menu for cleaner layout
  • Added quick "New Panel" button in header

Menu Enhancements

  • Added "Mark Complete/Incomplete" at top of panel menu
  • Added "Open Index Window" option in panel menu

Bug Fixes

  • Several minor UX improvements
